item.title: Feeling bored and wanting to design a Chinese ink wash style theme.
item.description:
I’ve gotten tired of staring at colorful, cluttered homepages and suddenly want to go for a minimalist style, designing a Chinese ink wash theme.

Because the current stylesheet is heavily customized, with specific styles configured to override the default theme styles for different elements.

Without refactoring, I tried using AI directly to generate a new theme, and the results were very unstable. Coincidentally, I also encountered a queue for trae claude large language model switching to vscode agent mode, which resulted in even worse effects – the generated output had no design sense whatsoever.

Ultimately, it comes down to the fact that I don’t fully understand front-end development and can’t effectively break down tasks and hand them over to AI.
